entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 08:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
